name: es6-polyfills
description: ES6 polyfills that use native implementation if available and do not pollute the global namespace

scripts.test: npm run test-nodejs && npm run test-browser
scripts.cover-nodejs: npm run test-nodejs && istanbul check-coverage coverage/nodejs/coverage.json
scripts.cover-browser: npm run test-browser && istanbul check-coverage coverage/browser/coverage-final.json
scripts.cover: npm run test && npm run combine-coverage && istanbul check-coverage coverage/combined/coverage-final.json
scripts.combine-coverage: istanbul-combine -d coverage/combined -r html -r lcov -r json coverage/nodejs/coverage.json coverage/browser/coverage-final.json
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run cover
scripts.publish-to-npm: npm install && npm run check && npm publish
